title: Microsoft Edge Chromium: CVE-2025-8901 Out of bounds write in ANGLE
title_translated: Microsoft Edge Chromium: CVE-2025-8901 Out of bounds write in ANGLE
summary: CVE-2025-8901 describes an out of bounds write vulnerability in ANGLE within Microsoft Edge Chromium. This flaw allows remote attackers to exploit memory access through specially crafted HTML pages, posing significant risks to affected users.

title: CVE-2025-8145
summary: The Redirection for Contact Form 7 plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to PHP Object Injection due to deserialization of untrusted input, allowing unauthenticated attackers to inject PHP Objects. This vulnerability can lead to arbitrary file deletion and, in certain configurations, Remote Code Execution.

title: CVE-2025-57790
summary: A vulnerability in Commvault before version 11.36.60 allows remote attackers to exploit a path traversal issue, leading to unauthorized file system access. This could potentially result in remote code execution on affected systems.

title: Trend Micro Apex One OS Command Injection Vulnerability
title_translated: Trend Micro Apex One OS Command Injection Vulnerability
summary: Trend Micro Apex One Management Console has an OS command injection vulnerability that allows pre-authenticated remote attackers to upload malicious code and execute commands. This poses a significant risk to affected installations, necessitating immediate mitigations or discontinuation of the product.
affected_products: Trend Micro Apex One Management Console

title: Red Hat JBoss EAP: CVE-2025-55163: Allocation of Resources Without Limits or Throttling
title_translated: Red Hat JBoss EAP: CVE-2025-55163: Allocation of Resources Without Limits or Throttling
summary: Red Hat JBoss EAP is vulnerable to a logical flaw in the HTTP/2 protocol that allows for resource exhaustion through malformed control frames, leading to a potential DDoS attack. This vulnerability affects versions prior to 4.1.124.Final and 4.2.4.Final, which have been patched.

title: PipeMagic вернулся: уязвимость Windows использована в кибератаках 2025 года
title_translated: PipeMagic is back: Windows vulnerability exploited in cyberattacks in 2025.
summary: The PipeMagic backdoor exploits the CVE-2025-29824 vulnerability in the clfs.sys driver, allowing attackers to gain local administrator privileges. This vulnerability was patched by Microsoft in April 2025, but the malware continues to target organizations in Saudi Arabia and Brazil.

title: N-able N-Central Command Injection Vulnerability
summary: N-able N-Central has a command injection vulnerability due to improper sanitization of user input, allowing attackers to execute arbitrary commands. Users are advised to apply mitigations as per vendor instructions or discontinue use if mitigations are unavailable.

title: N-able N-Central Insecure Deserialization Vulnerability
summary: N-able N-Central has an insecure deserialization vulnerability that may allow for command execution. Users are advised to apply mitigations as per vendor instructions or discontinue use if mitigations are not available.

title: RARLAB WinRAR Path Traversal Vulnerability
summary: RARLAB WinRAR has a path traversal vulnerability in its Windows version that allows attackers to execute arbitrary code through malicious archive files. Users are advised to apply vendor mitigations or discontinue use if fixes are unavailable.

title: Alma Linux: CVE-2025-38292: Moderate: kernel security update (ALSA-2025-13602)
title_translated: Alma Linux: CVE-2025-38292: Moderate: kernel security update (ALSA-2025-13602)
summary: A vulnerability in the Linux kernel's ath12k driver allows for a use-after-free error due to improper memory access after freeing a socket buffer. This could potentially lead to system instability or exploitation. The issue has been addressed in a security update.
